name: Lords Of Free Kick (ViceForce)
description:
Progress alone or with a friend all the way from Sunday League to World Cup finals.

Every league stage is different and more difficult then one before. Levels are generated randomly each time you play the game.

Game features wind mechanics, real-time physics, leveling system and more!

Hope you will enjoy the game!

SUPPORT: dominik.strok30@gmail.com
